Body:
C, F, T = fair.forward.fair_scm(emissions_driven=False, C=rcp45.
    Concentrations.gases, F_tropO3=rcp45.Forcing.tropo3, F_aerosol=rcp45.
    Forcing.aero + rcp45.Forcing.cloud, F_bcsnow=rcp45.Forcing.bcsnow,
    useMultigas=True)
datadir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), 'rcp45/')
T_expected = np.load(datadir + 'T_concdriven_multi.npy')
assert np.allclose(T, T_expected)
